puzzle.help: 1. On the board a few Thermometers are laid down. Your goal is to fill them according to the hints. 2. In a Thermometer, mercury always starts at the bulb and can progressively fill the Thermometer towards the end. 3. A Thermometer can also be completely empty, including the bulb. 4. The numbers on the border tell you how many filled cells are present on that Row or Column.
